mapper.select: SELECT a.student_university_code, c.university_name, a.student_school_id, d.school_name, a.student_id, e.full_name AS student_name, e.photo, e.cellphone, b.technology_id, b.teacher_id FROM shangshufang_customer.course_sign_up a INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.course b ON a.course_university_code = b.university_code AND a.course_school_id = b.school_id AND a.course_id = b.course_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.university c ON a.student_university_code = c.university_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.school d ON a.student_university_code = d.university_code AND a.student_school_id = d.school_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.university_student e ON a.student_university_code = e.university_code AND a.student_school_id = e.school_id AND a.student_id = e.student_id WHERE a.data_status = 'A' ORDER BY a.student_university_code, a.student_school_id, a.student_id, b.technology_id LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shangshufang_customer.university_student_ability_analysis (student_id, technology_id, finish_knowledge_count, finish_knowledge_percent, standard_score, position_site, ability_level) VALUES (#{studentID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{technologyID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishedKnowledgeCount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishedKnowledgePercent, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{standardScore, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{positionSite, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{abilityLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT analysis_id, student_id, technology_id, finish_knowledge_count, finish_knowledge_percent, position_site, standard_score, ability_level FROM shangshufang_customer.university_student_ability_analysis WHERE student_id = #{studentID,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND technology_id = #{technologyID,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT analysis_id, technology_id, student_id, finish_knowledge_count, finish_knowledge_percent, standard_score, ability_level FROM shangshufang_customer.university_student_ability_analysis WHERE technology_id = #{technologyID,jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT #{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT a.code_standard_id, b.code_standard_name, COUNT(1) AS total_count FROM shangshufang_customer.student_course_exercises_code_review_detail a INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.code_standard b ON a.language_id = b.language_id AND a.code_standard_id = b.code_standard_id WHERE a.student_id = #{studentID,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.language_id = #{languageID,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.code_standard_id ORDER BY total_count DESC;

SELECT b.university_code, c.university_name, b.school_id, d.school_name, a.student_id, b.full_name, b.sex, b.birth, b.photo, b.cellphone, b.email, b.enrollment_year, IFNULL(e.online_question_count, 0) AS online_question_count, IFNULL(f.online_answer_count, 0) AS online_answer_count FROM shangshufang_customer.university_student_ability_analysis a LEFT JOIN shangshufang_customer.university_student b ON a.student_id = b.student_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.university c ON b.university_code = c.university_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.school d ON b.university_code = d.university_code AND b.school_id = d.school_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT questioner_university_code, questioner_school_id, questioner_id, COUNT(1) AS online_question_count FROM shangshufang_customer.course_question WHERE questioner_id = #{studentID,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY questioner_university_code, questioner_school_id, questioner_id ) e ON b.university_code = e.questioner_university_code AND b.school_id = e.questioner_school_id AND a.student_id = e.questioner_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT commenter_university_code, commenter_school_id, commenter_id, COUNT(1) AS online_answer_count FROM shangshufang_customer.course_question_leave_message WHERE commenter_id = #{studentID,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND commenter_type = 'S' GROUP BY commenter_university_code, commenter_school_id, commenter_id ) f ON b.university_code = f.commenter_university_code AND b.school_id = f.commenter_school_id AND a.student_id = f.commenter_id WHERE a.student_id = #{studentID,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT a.analysis_id, a.student_id, a.technology_id, b.language_id, b.technology_name, a.finish_knowledge_count, a.finish_knowledge_percent, a.position_site, a.standard_score, a.ability_level FROM shangshufang_customer.university_student_ability_analysis a INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.technology b ON a.technology_id = b.technology_id WHERE student_id = #{studentID,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT a.student_university_code, c.university_name AS student_university_name, a.student_school_id, d.school_name AS student_school_name, b.major_id, e.major_name, a.student_id, b.full_name AS student_name, b.photo, a.technology_id, a.knowledge_total_count, a.finish_knowledge_count, a.finish_knowledge_percent, a.finish_exercises_count, a.once_compilation_success_rate, a.once_run_success_rate, a.position_site, a.standard_score, a.ability_level FROM shangshufang_customer.university_student_ability_analysis a INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.university_student b ON a.student_id = b.student_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.university c ON b.university_code = c.university_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.school d ON b.school_id = d.school_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.major e ON b.major_id = e.major_id WHERE a.technology_id = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.ability_level >= #{arg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a.standard_score DESC LIMIT 0, #{arg2,jdbcType=INTEGER};
